title: Flamingals Women’s Jeans Solid Double Breasted Pocket Straight Leg Jeans
description: Features: These pants are a wardrobe essential, featuring pockets, a zipper, button closure, flare leg, mid waist, and slight stretch. With their practical design and trendy silhouette, they effortlessly enhance the wearer's appearance and personality. Perfect for off-duty days and beyond, these pants combine style and comfort for a versatile and fashionable choice.

Material: Made from carefully chosen super stretch fabric to ensure our customers feel comfortable in all positions, whether sitting or squatting. The soft, lightweight, and breathable fabric reduces any sense of restriction.

Occasion: This garment is remarkably versatile and can be worn on a variety of occasions. Whether you're running errands, attending a casual get-together, or heading to the office, this piece is the perfect choice. It's even suitable for more formal events like parties or dinners out. Additionally, it's an excellent option for students, working professionals, and anyone who wants to look stylish and feel comfortable.

Size Chart: Small: Bust: 33-35", Waist: 27-28", Hips: 37-38", / Medium: Bust: 35-37", Waist: 29-30", Hips: 39-40", / Large: Bust: 37-39", Waist: 31-33", Hips: 41-43", / X-Large: Bust: 39-41", Waist: 34-36", Hips: 44-46", / XX-Large Plus: Bust: 41-43", Waist: 37-39", Hips: 47-49", / 3X-Large Plus: Bust: 43-45", Waist: 40-42", Hips: 50-52", / 4X-Large Plus: Bust: 45-47", Waist: 43-45", Hips: 53-55"

Friendly reminder, the size of this outfit is small. If you prefer a looser fit, please order a larger size. Before placing your order, please refer to the size measurements in the last item picture. Our sizing is based on a true-to-size fit, and as outfit fit experts, we recommend following the size chart. The fabric is super stretchy, so it's important to select the exact size that fits you best.
